ygData.subject: Re: Hostage Situation
ygData.msgSnippet: What the slag are you doing? Lunarpine asks as Ramulus takes his steps forward. he looks at Shadow Wing I think he s got a glitch, why are we taking orders

"What the slag are you doing?"Lunarpine asks as Ramulus takes his 
steps forward. he looks at Shadow Wing "I think he's got a glitch, 
why are we taking orders from scum on our own turf?" for that matter, 
he thought who died and made Ramulus Primus? The wolf in him said 
strike out against the enemy, the bot in him said an orders an order.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus shakes his head. "No, Lunarpine. Hold your fire, thats an 
order," he 
> raises his voice as he says the last sentence, so that everyone 
there can 
> hear him.
> 
> Ramulus takes several steps forward. "Very well, Shuko. A five day 
truce, and 
> 50 kilos of energon from you, and give us Ramhorn back unharmed. 
You may 
> leave safely then."
> 
> He keeps his gun ready, in case the Newcomer wasn't about to uphold 
his deal. 
> Ramulus didn't expect them to give the energon, but as long as the 
situation 
> was solved peacefully without any casualties, it was worth it.
